attributes.action: Consider the George Cross for PC Bill Barker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PC Bill Barker died doing what he loved; helping people! The news reports say that he died a hero. Bill died saving lives knowing that he could lose his own. To define the qualifying criteria: The George Cross, which may be awarded posthumously, is granted in recognition of "acts of the greatest heroism or of the most ...conspicuous courage in circumstances of extreme danger."

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
